Articles.Content:
Trying something new with this Poll, please vote and maybe this will be something you may want to give a try one day.

Sector 7 Space Laboratories VTOL Division - Spritz

 

 


Spritz
[imgur]g5v3M[/imgur]

Prototype



Craft Assembly: MK2 Inline Cockpit, 8 Whiplash Engines, Intakes 3 Shock Cones, 6 Radials, 6 Structural, 2 Inline Stabilizers, 4 Standard Canards

The Spritz had started with 4 Wheesleys on the belly for VTOL then more items were added during design changes and the craft required more thrust for lifting. I am releasing both craft so you can see some of many changes my craft go through. Many days of designing and flight testing are done to produce these craft.


Flight Operations:
Engage RCS and SAS, throttle up to full then press spacebar for the Lift Engines to engage and a second time for the Rear Engines. When landing vertical use the downward thrusters to help control your descent.

Parts:144
Mass:36.9t

Size
Height:4.3m
Width:12.4m
Length:10.0m

Flight Controls
1-Lift Engines
2-Rear Engines

Craft Files
Spritz

Spritz Prototype

Edited January 14, 2016 by castille7

[quote name='Azimech']Nice! I give it a 9 :-)[/QUOTE]

Well that's awesome! thank you!

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Fyi,

To other voters these are private votes if you do vote. This is something I thought about and wanted to let others see if it's something they may want to try. If I see these on your post I will vote for yours. Edited November 19, 2015 by castille7
Looks very futuristic! You scared me with that first album showing the older engines and intakes, I was trying to figure out where you got them. :D

[quote name='pTrevTrevs']Looks very futuristic! You scared me with that first album showing the older engines and intakes, I was trying to figure out where you got them. :D[/QUOTE]

Hahaha! I might be the last one updating to 1.0.5, I was in the middle of the Elcano Challenge, I sure picked a fine time to do that Challenge, everyone is having a blast at the launch pad and I was stuck on 1.0.4 haha. I still had about three crafts I was working on and trying to rush them out so I can update. I will update tonight and try not to scare you again. :D
